I do like page 17 though cause it's very tame compared to what Minazuki sensei usually does with gaping and I also like how he draws feet with so much detail, as opposed to other artists. Anyway, can't wait for the next part. I really wish he could update more frequently like someone like Esuke sensei. It feels like he has a new short story for every month.

I absolutely love the evolution of Minazuki Juuzou's art style. Probably my favorite art style right now in the industry and this is by far my favorite doujin from Minazuki sensei so far. I sort of have a love/hate relationship with a lot of his content because he seems to have a fetish for gaping assholes. We see it here, but it's extremely tame compared to some of the other anal content he's made in the past. I'm already not a fan of anal, but I can tolerate normal anal scenes. This chapter had normal anal. A lot of his other work has got to be the most exaggerated anal penetration I've ever seen in hentai.
Can't wait for the next chapter. Thanks Minazuki-sensei !
